title: Baklava with Toffee
ingredients: ['For the Baklava', '200g unsalted pistachios', '200g unsalted walnuts', '60g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '125-150g unsalted butter, melted', '8 sheets filo pastry', 'For the Toffee', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '175g honey', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 cinnamon stick']
